Prerequisite: Ranger, Silent Shot Student feat

Benefit: When you are attacking with a shortbow or a crossbow and you have proficiency with that weapon, you gain the following two benefits.

Whenever you hit an enemy with a martial power, that enemy takes a -2 penalty to Perception checks until the end of your next turn.

When you attack with a power associated with this feat, you can shift 2 squares before the attack as a free action.

Associated Powers:

Blow-Through Assault: (Only when used as a ranged attack)

Hammer Shot

,

Hunter's Shot

,

Knockdown Shot

,

Lightning Shot

,

Shadow Wasp Strike: (Only when used as a ranged attack)

Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 130.
